                                        </li>

                            <div class="list-header">Level</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level[]=post-masters&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                PhD                                            </a>
                                        </li>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level[]=postdoctoral&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                Postdoctoral                                            </a>
                                        </li>

                        </div>

                            <div class="list-header">Deadline</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">

                                                Spring Quarter (April-June)                                            </a>

                            <div class="list-header">Type</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&type[]=international-research-or-work&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                International Research                                            </a>
                                        </li>

                        </div>
                                                        <div class="list-container">
                            <div class="list-header">Eligibility</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&eligibility[]=no-citizenship-requirements&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                Open to international students                                            </a>
                                        </li>
                                                            </ul>
                        </div>
                                        </div>
        <div class="content">
            <p>The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.</p>
<h3>Eligibility</h3>
<p>Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.</p>
                            <div class="link">
                    <p>Fellowship Website:</p>
                    <a href="http://www.global.hosei.ac.jp/en/researchers/hif/" style="text-decoration: underline;">http://www.global.hosei.ac.jp/en/researchers/hif/</a>
                </div>
                                </div>
    </div>
    <div id="newsletter" class="newsletter">
    <div class="success-message">
        <p>Your information has been submitted. Thanks!</p>

UChicagoGRAD | The University of Chicago > Biological Sciences > Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship

Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship

Division
  • Biological Sciences
  • Divinity School
  • Humanities
  • Physical Sciences
  • Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering
  • Social Sciences
Level
  • PhD
  • Postdoctoral
Deadline
  • Spring Quarter (April-June)
Type
  • International Research
Eligibility
  • Open to international students

The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.

Eligibility

Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.

Fellowship Website:

Your information has been submitted. Thanks!

# Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship
Division
  * [ Biological Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=biological-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Divinity School ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=divinity-school&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Humanities ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=humanities&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Physical Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=physical-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=pme&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Social Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=social-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Level
  * [ PhD ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level\[\]=post-masters&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Postdoctoral ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level\[\]=postdoctoral&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Deadline
  * [ Spring Quarter (April-June) ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&deadline\[\]=spring-quarter-april-june&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Type
  * [ International Research ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&type\[\]=international-research-or-work&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Eligibility
  * [ Open to international students ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&eligibility\[\]=no-citizenship-requirements&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.
### Eligibility
Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.

                                        </li>

                            <div class="list-header">Level</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level[]=post-masters&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                PhD                                            </a>
                                        </li>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level[]=postdoctoral&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                Postdoctoral                                            </a>
                                        </li>

                        </div>

                            <div class="list-header">Deadline</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">

                                                Spring Quarter (April-June)                                            </a>

                            <div class="list-header">Type</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&type[]=international-research-or-work&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                International Research                                            </a>
                                        </li>

                        </div>
                                                        <div class="list-container">
                            <div class="list-header">Eligibility</div>
                            <ul>
                                                                        <li class="list-item">
                                            <a href="/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&eligibility[]=no-citizenship-requirements&form-input-0=Apply+Filters" style="text-decoration: underline;">
                                                Open to international students                                            </a>
                                        </li>
                                                            </ul>
                        </div>
                                        </div>
        <div class="content">
            <p>The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.</p>
<h3>Eligibility</h3>
<p>Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.</p>
                            <div class="link">
                    <p>Fellowship Website:</p>
                    <a href="http://www.global.hosei.ac.jp/en/researchers/hif/" style="text-decoration: underline;">http://www.global.hosei.ac.jp/en/researchers/hif/</a>
                </div>
                                </div>
    </div>
    <div id="newsletter" class="newsletter">
    <div class="success-message">
        <p>Your information has been submitted. Thanks!</p>

970 East 58th Street | Third Floor , Chicago, IL 60637
UChicagoGRAD | The University of Chicago > Biological Sciences > Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship

Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship

Division
  • Biological Sciences
  • Divinity School
  • Humanities
  • Physical Sciences
  • Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering
  • Social Sciences
Level
  • PhD
  • Postdoctoral
Deadline
  • Spring Quarter (April-June)
Type
  • International Research
Eligibility
  • Open to international students

The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.

Eligibility

Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.

Fellowship Website:

Your information has been submitted. Thanks!

# Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship
Division
  * [ Biological Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=biological-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Divinity School ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=divinity-school&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Humanities ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=humanities&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Physical Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=physical-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=pme&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Social Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=social-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Level
  * [ PhD ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level\[\]=post-masters&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Postdoctoral ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level\[\]=postdoctoral&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Deadline
  * [ Spring Quarter (April-June) ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&deadline\[\]=spring-quarter-april-june&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Type
  * [ International Research ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&type\[\]=international-research-or-work&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Eligibility
  * [ Open to international students ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&eligibility\[\]=no-citizenship-requirements&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.
### Eligibility
Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.

# Hosei International Fund (HIF) Foreign Scholars Fellowship
Division
  * [ Biological Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=biological-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Divinity School ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=divinity-school&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Humanities ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=humanities&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Physical Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=physical-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=pme&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Social Sciences ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&division\[\]=social-sciences&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Level
  * [ PhD ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level\[\]=post-masters&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)
  * [ Postdoctoral ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&level\[\]=postdoctoral&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Deadline
  * [ Spring Quarter (April-June) ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&deadline\[\]=spring-quarter-april-june&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Type
  * [ International Research ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&type\[\]=international-research-or-work&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


Eligibility
  * [ Open to international students ](https://grad.uchicago.edu/fellowships/fellowships-database/?query=&eligibility\[\]=no-citizenship-requirements&form-input-0=Apply+Filters)


The Hosei International Fund (HIF) invites young scholars enrolled in a doctoral degree program to apply to the HIF Fellowship Program to carry out non-degree research programs at Hosei University in Japan under the direction of and/or in cooperation with Hosei faculty and researchers for a period of six months. It is expected that joint cooperation and coordination with Hosei faculty will contribute much to the development of the university’s research capabilities.
### Eligibility
Applicants must be fluent in either Japanese or English and under the age of 39. Applicant must be presently enrolled in a doctoral degree program or have graduated from a doctoral program in the last 8 years. Only non-Japanese citizens are eligible to apply.
